description:
Offering all the benefits of responsibly sourced Merino wool (temperature regulation, odor resistance, moisture management), these Women’s Hike Light Cushion Icy Range Print Crew Socks also bring the comfort and durability: They’ve got a performance-oriented fit, added breathability, light cushioning right where you need it, and a Virtually Seamless toe. And it’s all wrapped up in a unique Kate Zessel design you might almost want to frame—although, for safety, we recommend you leave the frame at home.

  • Kate Zessel designs by Smartwool®
  • Indestructawool™ technology with extended durability zones
  • 4 Degree™ elite fit system for a dialed-in, performance-oriented fit
  • Additional body-mapped mesh zones for added breathability
  • Virtually Seamless™ toe for enhanced comfort
  • Comfort welt with 'stay put' fit
  • Women's specific fit
name: Smartwool Hike Light Cushion Icy Range Print Crew Socks - Women's
